titles.title: Access to Money (ATM) Act of 2001

To amend the Electronic Fund Transfer Act to prohibit any operator of an automated teller machine that displays any paid advertising from imposing any fee on a consumer for the use of that machine, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Financial Institutions and Consumer Credit.

bill.summary: 3/15/2001--Introduced. Access to Money (ATM) Act of 2001 - Amends the Electronic Funds Transfer Act to prohibit any imposition of consumer fees for the use of an automated teller machine (ATM) that displays paid advertising (other than public service announcements and direct advertising by the ATM operator).
